isis.stitle: 7.3 Liter Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1991) - ENGINE DIAGNOSTIC TEST PROCEDURES FOR 7.3 LITER DIESEL ENGINES - FUEL SYSTEM PRESSURES - CHECK MECHANICAL LIFT PUMP (FUEL SUPPLY) PRESSURE. [ALL APPLICATIONS EXCEPT U-HAUL].

svcproc.title: CHECK MECHANICAL LIFT PUMP (FUEL SUPPLY) PRESSURE. [ALL APPLICATIONS EXCEPT U-HAUL].

step1.para: Disconnect and plug the hose from the fuel filter outlet elbow and attach a 0-15 psi pressure gauge on the outlet elbow bleed connection. Refer to Figure 5.19.
Check pressure at rated speed, no load, with the transmission in neutral.
If the pressure is within specifications (1 psi min.), skip test B and perform test C and D.
If the pressure is not within specifications, change the fuel filter and recheck lift pump pressure. If the pressure at the fuel filter outlet remains low, perform test B.

figure.caption: Figure 5.19 Mechanical Lift Pump (Fuel Supply) Pressure
